    • Method Detail

      • onModuleLoad

        public void onModuleLoad()
        This is the entry point method.

      • closeMainMenuStartGame

        protected void closeMainMenuStartGame()
        This method will start the main game by adding the event listening panels to the RootLayoutPanel. The method is to be called from the mainmenu when it is finished running.

      • buildMainMenuVisual

        protected VerticalPanel buildMainMenuVisual()
        This method will create a main menu panel that will appear for the user to make selections. The panel will then disappear and the game will begin with the set selections.

      • multiplayerLobbyMenu

        protected void multiplayerLobbyMenu()
        Replaces the transitionMainMenu by creating a lobby view for users before the game starts.

      • transitionMainMenu

        protected void transitionMainMenu()
        Move from the first part of the main menu to the second.

      • createVisualStructure

        protected MemoryLayoutPanel createVisualStructure(int numberOfPlayers)
        Create the overall visual structure of the game screen.
        Returns:
        DockPanel initialized with all elements

      • createStaticPanel

        protected VerticalPanel createStaticPanel()

      • createInfoPanel

        protected TabLayoutPanel createInfoPanel(int numberOfPlayers)
        Create an information panel that will let you view all of the player's current statistics by their specific tab.
        Returns:
        infoPanel initialized with the correct number of players

      • buildGamePanel

        protected VerticalGamePanel buildGamePanel()
        Generate the vertical panel that holds all of the cards. This board will be interacted with throughout the game.
        Returns:
        VerticalPanel filled with horizontal panels of images

      • buildBoard

        protected MemoryGameBoard buildBoard()
        This method returns a fully filled game board based on the Singleton class.
        Returns:
        - filled out game board based on Appdata.java

      • setCardPixelSize

        protected void setCardPixelSize(Image image)
        Set image pixel size helper method
        Parameters:
        image - image to set pixel size

      • generateCard

        protected MemoryCard generateCard(Image front,
                      Image back,
                      Image selected)
